summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: On-market  
- **Total Shares Bought Back (as of 16/7/2025)**: 9,207,698 (9,054,638 + 153,060)  
- **Total Consideration Paid**: AUD 174,315,576.93 (171,138,066.64 + 3,177,510.29)  
- **Buy-back Program Details**:  
  - **Total Authorization**: Up to AUD 400 million  
  - **Duration**: 28/3/2025 to 27/3/2026  
  - **Broker**: Goldman Sachs Australia Pty Ltd  
- **Price Range**:  
  - **Highest Paid**: AUD 20.88 (on 16/7/2025)  
  - **Lowest Paid**: AUD 16.95 (on 31/3/2025)  
- **No shareholder approval required**.  

*Note: Routine daily update; no new material impact beyond ongoing buy-back execution.*
